name: Mr. Careful
description:
Mr. Careful is a game that instead of having a wide variety of actions/jumps that make you go fast, you have only one single option of movement: A jump that you can customize the power/angle of, a bit like golf in that regard.

At it's current state, the basic gameplay, panic button, and rudimentary collision is done... and that's it.

Although I want to add features like sticking to certain walls and jumping off of them, spikes to die on, water, slippery metal, and so forth, I don't really know how well I'd be able to handle PICO-8 LUA to handle such a task.
